short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 用图片找竞品或货源，跟踪速卖通产品6个月内的价格历史动态
short.en: Search by image and Track price history on Aliexpress within 3 or 6 months

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
主要特点：
1. 价格历史，追踪竞品6个月内的价格历史动态。
2. 跟踪价格并在价格下降时接收通知。
3. 以图搜同款，不仅可以找到竞品，还可以搜1688、亚马逊上同款，方便找货源。
4. 下载产品评论内容和晒图。
5. 下载速卖通产品大图、视频和详情页图片。
6. 批量翻译图片和编辑图片。


如果您有任何问题或建议，请随时与我们联系：
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact
long.en:
Key features:
1. Price history: track price history dynamics of competing products over a 6 month period.
2. Track prices and receive notifications when prices drop.
3. Search the same model with pictures, not only can find competitors, but also can search the same model on 1688, Amazon, easy to find the source.
4. Download product reviews and pictures.
5. Download images, videos and detail page images of products.
6. Batch translate images and edit images.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us:
https://www.aliprice.com/information/index?page=contact

By installing the AliPrice extension, you accept the terms of the "AliPrice Terms of Service" and allow the extension to redirect to affiliate program links, including AliExpress and other programs. AliPrice Terms of Service - https://www.aliprice.com/information/index/page/term_of_use
